text: Screen scraping: getting around "HTTP Error 403: request disallowed by robots.txt"
Is there a way to get around the following?

code: httperror_seek_wrapper: HTTP Error 403: request disallowed by robots.txt

text: Is the only way around this to contact the site-owner (barnesandnoble.com).. i'm building a site that would bring them more sales, not sure why they would deny access at a certain depth.
I'm using mechanize and BeautifulSoup on Python2.6.
